name: Ability Patch
effect: Allows for any Starter to unlock its Hidden Ability (except for Torchic, Combusken, and Blaziken).
location: You will need to talk to the red-haired lady in the laboratory once you completed the National PokeDex specified for the region (This applies only to the OT Dex). Legendaries do not need to be included.

location: You will need to talk to the red-haired lady in the laboratory once you completed the National PokeDex specified for the region (This applies only to the OT Dex). Legendaries do not need to be included.

name: Ability Patch
effect: Allows for any Starter to unlock its Hidden Ability (except for Torchic, Combusken, and Blaziken).
location: You will need to talk to the red-haired lady in the laboratory once you completed the National PokeDex specified for the region (This applies only to the OT Dex). Legendaries do not need to be included.

name: Ability Pill
effect: Allows for any Pokemon to change its Ability. This only works if the Pokemon has two or more Abilities.
location: You can purchase the Ability Pill from the Young Daycare Lady at the Table for 35,000.
